Script.name: onSysLoadEvent
Script.script:
function onSysLoadEvent(event, args)
dofile(getMudletHomeDir().."/scripts/3kmapper/areas.lua") dofile(getMudletHomeDir().."/scripts/3kmapper/3kmapper.lua") dofile(getMudletHomeDir().."/scripts/3kmapper/exits.lua")
current_area = "" fake_area = initFakeArea()
current_x = 0 current_y = 0 current_z = 0
last_x = 0 last_y = 0 last_z = 0
command = ""
mapping = false
current_room = 0 prior_room = 0
expandAlias("mfind")
end

Script.name: onSysDataSendRequest
Script.script: function onSysDataSendRequest(_, command) command = command --isDirection(command, exittable) --mapDirection(command) end
